elements.text: The circ function draws an empty circle.

x
  X coordinate of circle.
y
  Y coordinate of circle.
r
  Radius of circle.
col
  The color of the circle. If omitted, uses the
  last color something was drawn in.

The circfill() function behaves exactly the same
as circ() and takes the same arguments, but the
circle it draws is filled in.
